Its In The Tittle How Do You Make The Xp You Get From A NPC On Pimpscape?? Plz Tell... (Sigh) But No One Ever Duss... (Sigh) I Gess No Will This Time
(Sigh) Come On... If You Can
(Sigh)

once again wtf!! plz tell me in a sentance and…
in a tut like form or soming…
coz it don’t make sence just writing that…
coz where do i put it and stuff…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2007, 10:03:49 AM[/size][hr]rrrr. this allways happens

because all you fucking clever people say “oh thats easy so i will not help”
fuck all yea…

hitDiff = misc.random(maxDMG);
int attackXP = (hitDiff * 4);
addSkillXP(attackXP, 1);
